bearerToken.description:
Bearer token to login with api key
  // eslint-disable-next-line max-len

bearer.description: Use /login endpoint to get bearer token or use an API token

value.message: #1 api token named : API key for CI

get.description: Gets API token metadata by id

Generates a new One-Time Password secret
Return a 403 error if OTP secret is already set

post.description:
Saves OTP configuration
Returns a 403 error if OTP secret is already set
Returns a 401 error if OTP token doesn"t match with OTP secret
Generates a JWT token from One-Time Password token
Uploads new file and allows to change file name
